datastructures

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • datastructures.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for representing users
    Author:
    Romain Mormont

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      User(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password)
      Constructs a User based on its name and its password (the user is disconnected)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connect()
      Sets the user as connected
      void disconnect()
      Sets the user as disconnected
      java.lang.String getFormattedLastConnection()
      Returns the last connection date formatted
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of the user
      java.lang.String getPassword()
      Returns the password of the user
      boolean isConnected()
      Returns true if the user is connected
      void updateConnectionDate()
      Updates the last connection date of the user with the current date and time

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    java.lang.String password)
        Constructs a User based on its name and its password (the user is disconnected)

        name - a String containing the name of the user
        password - a String containing the password of the user
